title: Player Pages - Statcast Avg. (Hitter - league)
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint
custom_expected: All of the information will be from MLB games (sportID 1). Should see data related to launch speed, launch angle, and homerun distance

title: Player Pages - Statcast Avg. (Pitcher - league)
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint
custom_expected: All of the information will be from MLB games (sportID 1). Should see data related to release speed, release spin rate, and launch speed

title: Player Pages - Stats parameter is not included
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint
custom_expected: 400 response and message "Required List parameter 'stats' is not present"

title: Player Pages - Stats parameter is invalid
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint
custom_expected: 400 response and message "Invalid Request with value: test"

title: Player Pages - Season is 2018
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint
custom_expected: 200 response and season should now be 2018

title: Player Pages - Season is a future year/year without stats (2020)
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint
custom_expected: 200 response and empty stats array

title: Player Pages - Season is an invalid year (test)
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint
custom_expected: 200 response and empty stats array

title: Player Pages - Season parameter is removed
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint
custom_expected: 200 response and multiple seasons will be shown

title: Player Pages - The group is pitching instead of hitting
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint
custom_expected: 200 response and only launch speed will show because it’s the only valid pitching metric

title: Player Pages - The group is invalid (test)
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint
custom_expected: 200 response and empty stats array

title: Player Pages - The group parameter is not included
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint
custom_expected: 400 response and message "Required Set parameter 'group' is not present"

title: Player Pages - The metrics parameter is not included
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint
custom_expected: 500 response and message "Internal error occurred"

title: Player Pages - Metrics parameter is not set to anything
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint
custom_expected: 200 response and empty stats array

title: Player Pages - An invalid field (test) is added to the metric parameter
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint
custom_expected: 500 response and message "Internal error occurred"

title: Player Pages - Group by is set to invalid field (test)
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint
custom_expected: 400 response and message "Invalid Request with value: test"

title: Player Pages - The group is hitting instead of pitching
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint
custom_expected: 200 response and empty stats array

title: MLB Homepage - League Leaders
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint with the following hydrates: person,team
custom_expected: All data returned must be of type "R". All data will be from MLB games (sportID 1). The leader in each main statistical hitting and pitching category should be returned (wins, saves, earned run average, strikeouts, batting average, runs, homeruns, runs batted in, stolen bases)

title: MiLB Homepage - League Leaders
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint with the following hydrates: person,team
custom_expected: All data returned must be of type "R". All data will be from MiLB games (sportID 11). The leader in each main statistical hitting and pitching category should be returned (wins, saves, earned run average, strikeouts, walks and hits per inning pitched, batting average, runs, homeruns, runs batted in, stolen bases)

custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint with the following hydrates: person,team
custom_expected: 200 response and empty leagueLeaders array

title: MLB Homepage League Leaders - Remove leaderCategories parameter
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint with the following hydrates: person,team
custom_expected: 200 response and empty leagueLeaders array

custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint with the following hydrates: person,team
custom_expected: 200 response and same number of leader categories returned as original call

custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint with the following hydrates: person,team
custom_expected: 200 response and empty leagueLeaders array

custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint with the following hydrates: person,team
custom_expected: 200 response and same number of leader categories returned as original call

custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint with the following hydrates: person,team
custom_expected: 200 response and same number of leader categories returned as original call

title: MLB Homepage League Leaders - Season is a past year (2018)

custom_expected: 200 response and same number of leader categories returned as original call but for the 2018 season

custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint with the following hydrates: person,team
custom_expected: 200 response and same number of leader categories returned as original call (data from most current year)

title: MLB Homepage League Leaders - Add invalid hydrate
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint with the following hydrates: person,team
custom_expected: 200 response and same number of leader categories returned as original call

custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint with the following hydrates: person,team
custom_expected: 200 response and players up to rank 5 will be returned for each leader category

custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint with the following hydrates: person,team

title: iOS At Bat Stats - Player (Batting)
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint with the following hydrations: team,person
custom_expected: All data returned must be of type "R". All data will be from MLB games (sportID 1). The top 20 leaders in each main statistical hitting category should be returned (batting average, homeruns, runs batted in, stolen bases, runs, on base percentage, slugging percentage, on base plus slugging, hits, doubles, triples, walks, strikeouts, caught stealing, games played, at bats)

title: iOS At Bat Stats - Player (Pitching)
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint with the following hydrations: team,person
custom_expected: All data returned must be of type "R". All data will be from MLB games (sportID 1). The top 20 leaders in each main statistical pitching category should be returned (earned run average, wins, strikeouts, saves, walks and hits per inning pitched, batting average, innings pitched, complete games, games played, games started, losses, save opportunities, earned run, runs, hits, homeruns, walks)

title: iOS At Bat Stats - Player (Fielding)
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint with the following hydrations: team,person
custom_expected: All data returned must be of type "R". All data will be from MLB games (sportID 1). The top 20 leaders in each main statistical fielding category should be returned (games played, games started, innings, chances, put outs, assists, errors, double plays, stolen bases, caught stealing, stolen base percentage, passed balls, wild pitch, fielding percentage, range factor per game)

title: iOS At Bat Stats - Team (Batting)
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint
custom_expected: All data returned must be of type "R". The top teams in each main statistical hitting category should be returned (batting average, home runs, runs batted in, stolen bases, runs, on base percentage, slugging percentage, on base plus slugging, hits, doubles, triples, walks, strikeouts, caught stealing, games played, at bats)

title: iOS At Bat Stats - Team (Pitching)
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint
custom_expected: All data returned must be of type "R". The top teams in each main statistical pitching category should be returned (earned run average, wins, strikeouts, saves, walks and hits per inning pitched, batting average, innings pitched, complete games, games played, games started, losses, save opportunities, earned run, runs, hits, homeruns, walks)

title: iOS At Bat Stats - Team (Fielding)
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint
custom_expected: All data returned must be of type "R". All data will be from MLB games (sportID 1). The top teams in each main statistical fielding category should be returned (games played, games started, innings, chances, put outs, assists, errors, double plays, stolen bases, caught stealing, stolen base percentage, passed balls, wild pitch, fielding percentage)

title: Stats Page
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint with the following hydrations: team,person
custom_expected: All data will be from MLB games (sportID 1). The top 25 players will be returned in order of on base percentage based off the stats page default categories (player, hitting, 2019 season, qualified). Each player will return statistical data about themselves, data about their team, and personal player data as well

title: Stats Page - Remove sportId
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint with the following hydrates: team,person
custom_expected: 200 response and same data returned as original call (130 splits)

title: Stats Page - sportId is invalid (test)
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint with the following hydrates: team,person
custom_expected: 400 response and message "Invalid Request with value: test"

custom_expected: 200 response and 68 splits instead of 130

title: Stats Page - Remove leagueIds=104
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint with the following hydrates: team,person
custom_expected: 200 response and 62 splits instead of 130

custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint with the following hydrates: team,person
custom_expected: 400 response and message "Required List parameter 'stats' is not present"

custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint with the following hydrates: team,person
custom_expected: 400 response and message "Invalid Request with value: test"

custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint with the following hydrates: team,person
custom_expected: 200 response and 56 results back

custom_expected: 200 response and empty stats array

custom_expected: 400 response and message "Required Set parameter 'group' is not present"

custom_expected: 200 response and 130 totalSplits

title: Stats Page - Set gameType to unused parameter (test)
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint with the following hydrates: team,person
custom_expected: 200 response and 130 totalSplits

title: Stats Page - Change limit to 5
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint with the following hydrates: team,person
custom_expected: 200 response and splits array will have a length of 5 instead of 20

title: Stats Page - Change limit to 0
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint with the following hydrates: team,person
custom_expected: 200 response and empty splits array

title: Stats Page - Change limit to negative number (-1)
custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint with the following hydrates: team,person
custom_expected: 200 response and splits array will have a length of 50 (default) instead of 25

custom_expected: 200 response and splits array will have a length of 50 (default) instead of 25

custom_steps: Send request to the stats endpoint with the following hydrates: team,person
custom_expected: 200 response and same number of splits returned as original call

title: Single Season AllTimeLeaders - Hits - Regular Season as of 2019 top 10
custom_test_purpose: Check the list of assist leaders during the 2019 season.  Only show the top 10, for MLB only.  This is for all positions and during the regular season.
custom_steps: Send the request - GET https://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/stats/leaders?statType=statsSingleSeason&statGroup=fielding&limit=10&sportId=1&leaderGameTypes=R&leaderCategories=assists&season=2019
custom_expected:
We should have the single season leaders for assists through the 2019 MLB season:
![](index.php?/attachments/get/25594)

title: Single Season AllTimeLeaders - Home Runs - Regular Season as of 2019 top 20
custom_test_purpose: View the top MLB home run hitters during the regular season as of 2019.
custom_steps: Send Request:  GET https://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/stats/leaders?statType=statsSingleSeason&statGroup=hitting&limit=20&sportId=1&leaderGameTypes=R&leaderCategories=homeRuns&season=2019
custom_expected: ![](index.php?/attachments/get/25595)

title: SingleSeason AllTimeLeaders - Assists - Regular Season as of 2019 top 10
custom_steps: Send Request: GET https://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/stats/leaders?statType=statsSingleSeason&statGroup=fielding&limit=10&sportId=1&leaderGameTypes=R&leaderCategories=assits&season=2019
custom_expected: ![](index.php?/attachments/get/26582)

title: SingleSeason AllTimeLeaders - Catching - Regular Season as of 2019 top 10 - Caught Stealing
custom_steps: https://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/stats/leaders?statType=statsSingleSeason&statGroup=catching&limit=10&sportId=1&leaderGameTypes=R&leaderCategories=caughtStealing&season=2019
custom_expected: ![](index.php?/attachments/get/27581)

title: SingleSeason AllTimeLeaders - Stolen Bases - Regular Season as of 2019 top 8
custom_test_purpose: Let's view the top 7 all-time single season leaders in stolen bases. There is a tie for sixth place with three people.  So we should see three guys tied for 6th, for a total of 8.
custom_steps: Send GET https://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/stats/leaders?statType=statsSingleSeason&statGroup=hitting&limit=8&sportId=1&leaderGameTypes=R&leaderCategories=stolenBases&season=2019
custom_expected: ![](index.php?/attachments/get/25597)

title: SingleSeason AllTimeLeaders - Hitters - Regular Season as of 2019 top 25 single season hits for 3rd basemen
custom_test_purpose: We will look at the best season hitting in the area of total hits in the regular season for 3rd basemen, through the 2019 season.
custom_steps: GET https://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/stats/leaders?statType=statsSingleSeason&statGroup=hitting&limit=25&sportId=1&leaderGameTypes=R&leaderCategories=hits&season=2019
custom_expected: ![](index.php?/attachments/get/25598)
